meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the February 27, 2024, Commission on Disabilities meeting.

agenda_items.title: Officer Reports
agenda_items.description: Chairman John Kalkanli will review his attendance at WFAA’s Disabilities Listening Session on behalf of the City of Dallas’ Commission on Disabilities organized by North Texas Disability Chamber on March 19, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Briefings
agenda_items.description: Assistant Director/WCIA Officer, Christina da Silva, and Human Rights Officer, Christopher Graves, will present on the proposed creation of a Human Rights Commission. Interim Director of the Office of Emergency Management, Travis Houston will present on Emergency Management Preparedness for persons with disabilities.
agenda_items.presenter: Christina da Silva, Christopher Graves, Travis Houston
